description.value: This example value set defines a set of codes that can be used to indicate the purpose for which you would contact a contact party.

definition.value: Contact details for information regarding to billing/general finance enquiries.
Contact details for issues related to Human Resources, such as staff matters, OH&S etc.
Contact details for dealing with issues related to insurance claims/adjudication/payment.
Dedicated contact point for matters relating to press enquiries.
